ComicInfo.Summary:
The mystery is only getting stranger but as our heroes are about to learn, maybe it’s not their job to save the critters...the critters just might be here to save them. It’s going to be a super fun ride as these creatures turn up the heat...literally.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Becky Dreistadt | 1 | B | Cover B | Derek Sullivan | 2 | RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive Cover | Katy Farina & Maryanna Hoggatt | 3 | RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Cover | Jeremy Sorese | 4 |
